properties.name: Alti Førde
properties.description: Largest shopping center between Bergen and Ålesund with about 45 stores. Spacious aisles, elevator access to all floors.
properties.notes: Changing and nursing room on the 2nd floor near the food court. Pick up the key from the info desk on the 1st floor. 250 parking spots with 1-3 hours free.

properties.name: Førdehuset (Library & Cultural Center)
properties.description: Civic center housing the public library, swimming pool, and cinema. The library has a cozy children's corner.
properties.notes: Baby changing area in the ground floor toilet. The library has a nice children's section. Also features a warm infant pool in the swimming area.

properties.name: Elvetorget
properties.description: Shopping center in the town center by the river Jølstra.
properties.notes: Wheelchair accessible entrance from the parking level.

properties.name: Sunnfjord Museum
properties.description: Open-air museum showing day-to-day life of farmer and tenant families in Sunnfjord in the 1800s. Outdoor paths between historic buildings.
properties.notes: Gravel paths between buildings — difficult with a stroller in wet weather. Nice outdoor area for kids to explore.

properties.name: Sogn og Fjordane Kunstmuseum
properties.description: Museum of modern and contemporary art in the town center. Has a cozy café.
properties.notes: The café is a nice stop with a stroller. Wheelchair accessible throughout.

properties.name: Jølstra River Playground
properties.description: Playground along the river Jølstra, near the town center with seating areas.
properties.notes: Flat paved path along the river — great for strollers. Benches available. No toilet facilities nearby.
